constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of ground floor side/rear extension. Changes to first floor fenestration. Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions, with chimney stack removal, installation of 2no front roof lights and 2no side roof lights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B, C & G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that condition 4 (materials samples)  of planning permission 22/03204/FUL are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide a Proposed Block Plan drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
